alert.note: Alert for Redwood; Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 11 at 9:27PM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River At Morton affecting Renville and Redwood Counties. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River At Morton. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Riverside Rd and Front Street flooded in North Redwood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 900 PM CDT Tuesday, the stage was 22.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 900 PM CDT Tuesday was 22.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23.2 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 23.5 feet on 06/25/2013. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
